alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 11:42PM EDT until September 22 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wyoming County in western New York... Northern Cattaraugus County in western New York... Southern Erie County in western New York... Northeastern Chautauqua County in western New York... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1141 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Silver Creek, or 7 miles north of Dunkirk, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Evans, Boston, Eden, Springville, Colden and Orchard Park. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
